title: Online Education Based on Data Ethics Modules (Self-Directed)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational data analysis, understanding of research methodologies
context.additional_context: Content structured for smartphone-based learning environments, with modular design accommodating learners from diverse academic backgrounds

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three ethical issues that may arise during the research data processing process
Learners can analyze the co-production structure of research data by applying the concept of data ecology
Learners can propose solutions applying data ethics principles (transparency, accountability, fairness) based on real-world cases

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
